channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 19:16 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 19:16 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 19:15 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 19:15 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 7:14 p.m. Alarm repulse in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Manganets and Manganetsk Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community
